title: Modifying the Scope of the Reciprocal Tariffs With Respect to Certain Agricultural Products
summary: This Presidential document, Executive Order 14360, modifies the scope of reciprocal tariffs previously imposed under Executive Order 14257, as amended. The order exempts certain agricultural products from these tariffs. This modification is based on additional information and recommendations, ongoing negotiations with trading partners, and current domestic demand and production capacity. The changes, detailed in updated Annex II to Executive Order 14257 and the Annex to Executive Order 14346, are effective from November 13, 2025. The Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States (HTSUS) is modified accordingly. The Secretaries of Commerce and Homeland Security, along with the United States Trade Representative, are directed to implement these changes. The order also includes provisions for monitoring the emergency situation and potential further actions.
